content.webTitle: Readers in Finland: tell us what you think of new PM Sanna Marin

fields.headline: Readers in Finland: tell us what you think of new PM Sanna Marin
fields.bodyText: Sanna Marin has been elected as the new prime minister in Finland, making her the country’s youngest ever head of government. Her rise to prominence places her among the largely female-dominated leadership of Finland’s coalition, but she joins at a time of disruption due to strike action affecting some of the country’s largest companies and its ongoing movement toward carbon neutrality. Share your thoughts You can get in touch by filling in the form below, only the Guardian has access to your responses. One of our journalists may be in touch to discuss further as part of an upcoming news report. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
